intro: Effusiella trulla, commonly known as the tropical orchid, is a flowering plant belonging to the Orchidaceae family. It is characterized by its elegant, pendulous inflorescences and showy, fragrant flowers that come in a variety of colors. The plant typically grows as an epiphyte, attaching itself to trees in its native tropical and subtropical habitats. Its leaves are broad and fleshy, adapted to store water in arid conditions. Effusiella trulla thrives in warm, humid environments and requires well-drained soil for optimal growth.
